Open source and free to edit
All the objects shipped with the package are abstractions and can thus be freely edited to your liking.
The entire package is available on Xenorama's Github to download.
Desired solutions
The package was produced and compiled starting out in December 2020 and there are still many functions which may not be supported yet, dysfunctional or not obvious on how to achieve them. It would be highly appreciated, if experienced bugs can be reported via the github-page, as well as, of course, suggestions for improvement.
